ComicInfo.Title: No Pity from Your Friends
ComicInfo.Summary:
THE PHANTOM MENACE!
An invisible threat is loose on the island of Krakoa - unseen, unheard, undetectable by any...except Excalibur.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-17 15:50:15. [CVDB842202] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 11:47:42. [Issue ID 2214895]
